name: Black Crystal 7
description: This is the new spy adventure game! This project was made for the GameDev.tv Community Jam, I had a lot of fun making it and I hope you all like it. The game is still in early asses, so there are still a lot of things missing. Especially a tutorial,  sorry it isn't in this version but it will be coming soon. Black Crystal 7 was made in only a month and this is my first solo game. It's filled with guns, enemy's, themed world, and power ups. I hope you enjoy!
